description: Dashboard for the Cilium v1.12 (https://cilium.io/) Hubble metrics

targets.expr: topk(10, sum (rate(hubble_port_distribution_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", port!="0"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, port, protocol))

sum(rate(hubble_tcp_flags_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", family="IPv4", flag="SYN"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) - sum(rate(hubble_tcp_flags_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", family="IPv4", flag="SYN-ACK"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)

sum(rate(hubble_tcp_flags_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", family="IPv6", flag="SYN"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) - sum(rate(hubble_tcp_flags_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", family="IPv6", flag="SYN-ACK"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)

sum(rate(hubble_icmp_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", family="IPv4", type="EchoRequest"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) - sum(rate(hubble_icmp_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", family="IPv4", type="EchoReply"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)

sum(rate(hubble_icmp_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", family="IPv6", type="EchoRequest"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) - sum(rate(hubble_icmp_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", family="IPv6", type="EchoReply"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)
sum(rate(hubble_drop_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", reason="Policy denied"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, reason)
sum(rate(hubble_drop_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", reason="Policy denied"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, protocol)
topk(10, sum(rate(hubble_drop_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", reason="Policy denied"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, source))

panels.title: Top 10 Source Pods with Denied Packets

targets.expr: topk(10, sum(rate(hubble_drop_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", reason="Policy denied"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, destination))

panels.title: Top 10 Destination Pods with Denied Packets

targets.expr: sum(rate(hubble_dns_responses_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", rcode="No Error"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, qtypes)

sum(rate(hubble_dns_queries_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, qtypes) - sum(rate(hubble_dns_responses_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, qtypes)
sum(rate(hubble_dns_responses_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", rcode!="No Error"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, qtypes, rcode)
topk(10,sum(rate(hubble_dns_responses_total{service="hubble-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", rcode!="No Error"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, destination))

title: Hubble / Overview
